about_the_game:
Die Daddy Die belongs to the group of action games, more specifically platform games, with adventure and exploration elements.

It is based on the use of the unique body of our protagonist to solve traps and situations that arise in order to continue advancing, as well as taking advantage of his abilities to combat or overcome enemies that block his path.
The goal of the protagonist is to find the creator of him and finish him off by abandoning him on an unknown planet. To do this, you must climb the highest tower, overcome platforms and kill the enemies that cross your path.

HISTORY
The universe in theory was created approximately thousands of years ago... and practically since then the legendary race of the Gorn, a caste of (self-proclaimed) galactic gods, was born.


These were praised by thousands of adjacent planets, as they stood out for their exploration skills that helped them discover new elements that would allow them to evolve at a dizzying pace. However, not everything could be good.

Their eagerness to explore quickly turned into unparalleled stupidity, which was also helped by the fact that none of the different races of aliens had the courage to oppose them. They were not much of reproaches, go.

Among all that mass of stunned omnipotent beings, one god stood out, Chorh. Powerful, dumb and with resources to spare. A good breeding ground.


He decided that he would discover the greatest of treasures and that he would not share it with anyone (after requesting a ship and food from the parents).

And without further ado, he left, aimlessly and with equal parts emotion. After months of “intrepid travel”, Chorh was running out of songs to hum and ship elements without insulting, and in one of his numerous naps, he heard a thud from the ship, and by the time he wanted to open his eyes, he found that This one is stamped with his luxurious ship in a masterful tower of an unknown planet.

Pissed off, he decides to go out and destroy something for bothering him, but ends up stopping at the door of the ship. It was the most beautiful and resourceful planet he had ever seen in his life. And it was all for him, waiting to be "explored".

Laughter, blows, the occasional insult and flatulence of celebration was all he was able to emit of joy.

He had to get out. Now this was HIS planet of his. Not his parents, only his. And he jumped out of his ship, no matter what damage would be done, it was future Chorh's problem.


In his silly search race he would not pay attention to a small detail, and it is that it is cold that you shit, as well as that he goes out without any coat, something that would not matter to him at that moment and that as he progressed he cared more and more .



Finally, due to cold wind currents, he would drift into a sneeze. To call it something. It was the largest expulsion (or explosion) of air ever made by a living being. Snot, tears and drool by tons were released by this almighty memo.

Such would be the caliber of the sneeze, that he himself thought that something had exploded and led him to flee the scene of that disgusting crime without worrying that he had left it there.

And among all that destruction, something seemed to move. And no, what he killed with that sneeze was already dead and re-dead. It was something else… Something very unpleasant… And I live.

Mucus would come out of the rubble. A mucus of the god himself. That god who was watching his new phlegmy offspring run away. That mucus had mixed feelings at that time. And Babas.


And getting up and looking (as best he could) towards the tower to which his damned father was fleeing, between sobs and drools, he would swear the greatest revenge that an intergalactic son of a god would ever have.

And even he would realize that it would not be an easy task.

MAIN FEATURES

Absurd humor
Will be very present in the game in several ways:

●Conversations with static NPCs scattered throughout the levels.
●Protagonist: The main character, being a slime, will have bulging eyes that will move uncontrollably.

Puzzle
The different floors that our protagonist will go through will be full of small setbacks and traps that must be overcome to advance.

These can be overcoming obstacles and barricades with mucus abilities, pressing buttons to open doors, or triggering traps.

Enemies
There will be enemies scattered throughout the stages. These will go for the protagonist from the platform they are on and will damage the protagonist by contact.

short_description: Die Daddy Die is a 3d adventure and platform game in which you control a slime thrown by a Cosmic God, capable of deforming his body at will, solving traps and situations that arise in order to continue advancing.
